mapper.sql: id, pid, perm_name, perm_type, perm_status, sort, url, perm_code, icon, perm_desc, gmt_create, gmt_modified
mapper.select: SELECT a.* FROM sys_permission a INNER JOIN sys_role_permission b on a.id = b.perm_id INNER JOIN sys_user_role c on b.role_id = c.role_id INNER JOIN sys_role d on c.role_id = d.id AND d.role_status =0 AND c.user_id = #{userId} AND a.pid = #{pid} order by sort

SELECT a.* FROM sys_permission a INNER JOIN sys_role_permission b on a.id = b.perm_id INNER JOIN sys_role d on b.role_id = d.id AND d.role_status =0 AND d.role_name = #{roleName} AND a.pid = #{pid} order by sort

SELECT DISTINCT a.perm_code FROM sys_permission a INNER JOIN sys_role_permission b on a.id = b.perm_id INNER JOIN sys_user_role c on b.role_id = c.role_id INNER JOIN sys_role d on c.role_id = d.id AND d.role_status =0 AND c.user_id = #{userId}
